ygData.subject: RE: Charred Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow just what I needed.. I just picked up the Boots and Gauntlets (had them on the first kill) and was looking for the BP. I don t think I ve seen the
ygData.messageBody:
Wow just what I needed.. I just picked up the Boots and Gauntlets (had them
on the first kill) and was looking for the BP. I don't think I've seen the
Clockwork EXG though, where does it spawn?? (I've only been in Soulesk A
for a day)..



-----Original Message-----
From: Tony Donatelli [mailto:donatea@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 9:50 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Charred Items


From: "Tony Donatelli" <donatea@...>

I was just going through my EQ-shadowknight folder and realized that we
never finished the thread about the charred stuff. So I thought I would.


Charred Guardian Breastplate --> dropped by clockwork EXG (a larger sized
female robot), is rare.

Charred Boots --> the fire goblin captain has these, he's a rare spawn but
boots are common loot.

Charred Gauntlets --> off the fire goblin captain too, but this is the rare
drop.


There, I hate loose ends. ;)

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elven SK (34)
Fennin Ro
